alert.note: Alert for DeSoto (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 4:43PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central DeSoto and southeastern Shelby Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 443 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Southeast Memphis, or near Southaven, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Southaven, Germantown, Olive Branch, Cordova, Memphis, Lakeland, Southeast Memphis, Downtown Memphis, Whitehaven, Frayser, Midtown Memphis, Elmore Park, Raleigh, Parkway Village, White Station, Capleville and Plum Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
